org.elasticsearch.cluster.routing.allocation.decider

Class SameShardAllocationDecider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.common.component.AbstractComponent
      • org.elasticsearch.cluster.routing.allocation.decider.AllocationDecider
        • org.elasticsearch.cluster.routing.allocation.decider.SameShardAllocationDecider

  • public class SameShardAllocationDecider
extends AllocationDecider
    An allocation decider that prevents multiple instances of the same shard to be allocated on the same node. The "cluster.routing.allocation.same_shard.host" setting allows to perform a check to prevent allocation of multiple instances of the same shard on a single host, based on host name and host address. Defaults to `false`, meaning that no check is performed by default.

    Note: this setting only applies if multiple nodes are started on the same host. Allocations of multiple copies of the same shard on the same node are not allowed independently of this setting.
